name: Vicenna - Health Cloud
description: A Cloud-based Hospital Management System providing HMS as SAAS (Software as a Service). The idea was to provide a configurable hospital management system that resides entirely on the cloud and is accessed by a single-page web application where all the computation is being done in the cloud and only the user interface resides on the local machines.
role: Worked as a backend developer on health cloud (Cloud-based Hospital Management System) writing Web Services to expose data to the application's front end
Researched and developed several proofs of concepts to make the application HL7 compliant
Worked on end-to-end integrations for effective communication between the Health cloud and other existing systems
Integrated health-cloud with Dynamics 365 ERP system for syncing patient details between HMIS and ERP
Optimized application code and implemented strategies to improve performance under heavy loads, introduced Microservices to separate certain functionality from the monolithic application
Worked on proof of concept to make the health cloud work with local PACS repositories
Implemented CosmosDB to fetch frequently accessed data faster than relational database
Worked with Azure Hybrid Connections to provide Azure applications access to on-premises SQL Server
Designed and developed Windows Services for pushing legacy data from various systems to the health cloud
Worked on multi-tenancy using a hybrid approach (sharding)
Developed a Proof-of-Concept application for digitizing HMIS Clinical Documents using C-CDA standards
